thread.title: OMG! Check Out This Photo of DJ and Steve from Fuller House
thread.title_full: OMG! Check Out This Photo of DJ and Steve from Fuller House

author: Liz Raftery, TV GUIDE
title: OMG! Check Out This Photo of DJ and Steve from Fuller House
text:
Full House | Photo Credits: ABC/Getty Images Photo: 2010 American Broadcasting Companies, Inc. Full House | Photo Credits: ABC/Getty Images OMG! Check Out This Photo of DJ and Steve from Fuller House 1 / 1 Back to Gallery 
Will high school sweethearts DJ ( Candace Cameron Bure ) and Steve ( Scott Weinger ) rekindle their romance on Fuller House ? It sure looks like it. 
Weigner posted a photo on Instagram Wednesday of Bure kissing him, with the caption "Sorry, Internet." He also included the hashtag #iloveyoudj. 
It's already been confirmed that Steve is not DJ's deceased husband on the upcoming Netflix reboot, but will she find new love with her former flame? Or will Steve appear in an imaginary "what if" scenario? Only time will tell. 
Check out the photo here: A photo posted by Scott Weinger (@scottweinger) on Sep 30, 2015 at 7:59pm PDT 
Fuller House is scheduled to premiere on Netflix next year. Most Popular
